languages.text: "А ну отвечай, мразь, ты покушение на Лорд-капитана совершил?" {n}Хротко хватает рабочего за грудки. Куртка Гведона распахивается, обнажая неровные оккультные знаки, нарисованные на теле.{/n} "Что это тут у нас? Еретические знаки?! Ах ты погань культистская!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"
languages.original_text: "А ну отвечай, мразь, ты покушение на Лорд-капитана совершил?" {n}Хротко хватает рабочего за грудки. Куртка Гведона распахивается, обнажая неровные оккультные знаки, нарисованные на теле.{/n} "Что это тут у нас? Еретические знаки?! Ах ты погань культистская!"

traits.locale_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Profane brands? Cultist scum!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Profane brands? Cultist scum!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Profane brands? Cultist scum!"

"Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

languages.text: « Parle, misérable ! Avoue que tu as tenté d'assassiner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Hrotko empoigne l'ouvrier par le revers de sa veste, dont les pans s'écartent pour révéler des symboles occultes grossièrement peints sur son corps.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Des marques hérétiques ? Saleté de fanatique ! »
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

traits.locale_text: « Parle, misérable ! Avoue que tu as tenté d'assassiner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! » {n}Hrotko empoigne l'ouvrier par le revers de sa veste, dont les pans s'écartent pour révéler des symboles occultes grossièrement peints sur son corps.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Des marques hérétiques ? Saleté de fanatique ! »

languages.text: «¡Desembucha, miserable! Has intentado matar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, ¿verdad?». {n}Hrotko agarra al trabajador por la solapa. El abrigo de Gwedon se abre, revelando símbolos ocultos rudimentarios pintados por todo su cuerpo.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Marcas heréticas? ¡Escoria cultista!».
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Desembucha, miserable! Has intentado matar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, ¿verdad?». {n}Hrotko agarra al trabajador por la solapa. El abrigo de Gwedon se abre, revelando símbolos ocultos rudimentarios pintados por todo su cuerpo.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Marcas blasfemas? ¡Escoria cultista!».

languages.text: “说吧，你这条臭蛆！你打算杀害领主舰长，对不对？”{n}赫洛卡抓住戈登翻开的领子。戈登身上的外套被扯开了，浑身上下都画满了神秘的符号。{/n}“这是什么玩意儿？异端印记？你这信奉邪教的人渣！”
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

traits.locale_text: “说吧，你这条臭蛆！你打算杀害领主舰长，对不对？”{n}赫洛卡抓住戈登翻开的领子。戈登身上的外套敞开了，露出了全身上下的神秘符号。{/n}“这是什么玩意儿？邪恶的印记？你这信奉邪教的人渣！”

languages.text: 「いいから口を開け、この惨めな者め！ロード・キャプテンを殺そうとしたんだろう？」{n}フロトコは労働者の胸ぐらをつかんだ。グウェドンのコートが飛ぶように開き、体中に描かれた異端の印が露わになった。{/n}「なんだこれは？魔女団のクズが！」
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいから口を開け、この惨めな者め！ロード・キャプテンを殺そうとしたんだろう？」{n}フロトコは労働者の胸ぐらをつかんだ。グウェドンのコートが飛ぶように開き、体中に描かれたオカルトの印が露わになった。{/n}「なんだこれは？魔女団のクズが！」

languages.text: "Redet endlich, Ihr erbärmlicher Abschaum! Ihr habt versucht, den Lord Captain zu töten, nicht wahr?" {n}Hrotko packt den Arbeiter am Revers. Gwedons Mantel fliegt auf und gibt den Blick auf krude okkulte Symbole frei, mit denen sein gesamter Körper bemalt ist.{/n} "Was ist das? Ketzerische Brandzeichen? Kultistenabschaum!"
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"

traits.locale_text: "Redet endlich, Ihr erbärmlicher Abschaum! Ihr habt versucht, den Lord Captain zu töten, nicht wahr?" {n}Hrotko packt den Arbeiter am Revers. Gwedons Mantel fliegt auf und gibt den Blick auf krude okkulte Symbole frei, mit denen sein gesamter Körper bemalt ist.{/n} "Was ist das? Ketzerische Brandzeichen? Kultistenabschaum!"

languages.text: "Konuşmaya başla iğrenç yaratık! Lord Kaptan'ı öldürmeye çalıştın, değil mi?" {n}Hrotko, işçiyi yakasından tutuyor. Gwedon'un kabanının fermuarı açılarak tüm bedenine resmedilmiş, kaba saba, esrarlı sembolleri açığa çıkarıyor.{/n} "Bu nedir? Kâfir damgaları mı? Tarikatçı pislik!"
languages.original_text: "Start talking, you miserable wretch! You tried to kill the Lord Captain, didn't you?" {n}Hrotko grabs the worker by the lapels. Gwedon's coat flies open, revealing crude occult symbols painted all over his body.{/n} "What's this? Heretical brands? Cultist scum!"
